/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. Cars are parked neatly along the sides of the street, hinting at the rhythm of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
